Data: 2pm: Toss: West Indies have won the toss and Australia have been asked to bat first. The teams will be up shortly.
Roach to Watson, no run appeal for a lbw straightaway! Gets a lot of inward movement and traps him on the pads but down the leg side
Roach to Watson, 1 wide this time he doesn't control the radar and the ball slides down the legside
Roach to Watson, no run 142.9 kph, seemed quicker than that, lands outside off and he's happy to let that go
Roach to Watson, no run 144 kph, big inswing again, hurries the batsman and the ball clips his pads and lobs up
Roach to Watson, no run tempts him with a full and wide delivery outside off and he goes for a flashy drive and misses
Roach to Watson, no run full on middle and leg and pushed down to mid-on, tells his partner to stay back
Roach to Watson, no run shuffles and clips him down to square leg
Rampaul to Marsh, no run lands it on a good length on the off stump and he defends
Rampaul to Marsh, 4 leg byes slides down the leg side and he tickles it down to fine leg off his pads, just beats Ramdin
Rampaul to Marsh, 1 run whoopsy! Gets a thick leading edge which just beats point, extra bounce there
Rampaul to Watson, no run lands it on a good length wide outside off and the ball holds its line before reaching the keeper
Rampaul to Watson, no run defends with soft hands and the ball drops somewhere near the crease
Rampaul to Watson, FOUR runs good shot, full and sat up outside the off stump waiting to be hit, he plays an elegant drive off the front foot and beats the big gap between mid-off and cover
Roach to Marsh, no run good length on the off stump and defended down the pitch
Roach to Marsh, no run gets behind the line and pats it back to the bowler
Roach to Marsh, no run full on the pads and clipped down to midwicket
Roach to Marsh, no run angles across the left-hander and he defends with soft hands
Roach to Marsh, no run just keeps it on the channel outside the off stump and he's happy to let it go
Roach to Marsh, no run clips him down to square leg and tells his partner to wait
Rampaul to Watson, no run pace and bounce, caught Watson by surprise there, he tried to cut it but the ball suddenly reared up off a good length, close call!
Rampaul to Watson, no run drops it down to the off side with soft hands
Rampaul to Watson, no run defended off the back foot to gully
Rampaul to Watson, no run clips it to midwicket and Marsh stops in his tracks from the other end
Rampaul to Watson, no run stays behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
Rampaul to Watson, 2 runs Watson gets impatient and tries to hoick it away over the on side, he fails to time the pull and the top edge just clears the infield, two fielders charge after it
Roach to Marsh, no run angles across the left-hander and he leaves it to the keeper
Roach to Marsh, no run fullish in length on the off stump and he pushes it down to mid-off
Roach to Marsh, no run
Roach to Marsh, 1 run angles it on the pads and he clips it with the line to fine leg
Roach to Watson, no run stays back and defends down the pitch back to the bowler
Roach to Watson, 1 run gets beside the line and steers him wide of the slips down to third man
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run full in length outside off and he steers it down to point
Rampaul to Marsh, no run full on the stumps and defended down the track
Rampaul to Marsh, FOUR runs he capitalises on the width outside the off stump, bends his leg slightly and steers it past the gap between cover and point, nice timing
Rampaul to Marsh, no run
Rampaul to Marsh, FOUR runs pitching it full isn't working for West Indies, gift on the pads and he shows a straight bat and pushes it effortlessly past mid-on
Rampaul to Marsh, no run beats him outside off with a slower ball, good comeback by the bowler
Roach to Watson, 1 run pushes it wide of the bowler and takes a quick single to mid-on
Roach to Marsh, no run stays back and pushes it down the pitch
Roach to Marsh, 1 run pushes it with soft hands down to mid-off and sets off for a quick single, good calling
Roach to Watson, no run slower ball and he tries to dab it down to third man but gets a thick outside edge which drops short of the keeper
Roach to Watson, FOUR runs drops it short of a length on the middle stump, he swivels and pulls over square leg, that's Watto's favourite shot
Roach to Watson, 1 run opens the face and steers it down to third man
Rampaul to Watson, 2 runs angles it on the pads and he clips him wide of midwicket
Rampaul to Watson, no run stays behind the line and defends down the pitch
Rampaul to Watson, 2 runs angles it on the pads and he clips it down to deep midwicket, Pollard throws and hits the stumps direct at the striker's end but the batsman's home
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run short and pulled firmly but Pollard's there at deep square leg to mop up
Rampaul to Marsh, no run full and driven back down the pitch, Rampaul tries to deflect it to the stumps but the ball rolls to mid-off, the batsmen think of a single

Rampaul to Marsh, 3 runs clips it down to deep midwicket and Simmons gives the chase, he fires a quick throw to Rampaul who whips off the bails but the batsman is just home, the third umpire takes a look, good pickup and throw by the fielder
Smith to Marsh, no run lands it outside off and he's happy to let it go
Smith to Marsh, no run stays beside the line and cuts to point
Smith to Marsh, no run cuts again but finds point
Smith to Marsh, no run chops it down to point again, like an action replay
Smith to Marsh, no run default mode, no I'm not pressing the rewind button, chops it down to point again
Smith to Marsh, FOUR runs breaks the monotony with a firm drive off the front foot wide of mid-off, full outside off and spanked away
Rampaul to Watson, FOUR runs drops it short and angles it on the body, he bends his knee slightly, gets on top of the bounce and pulls to long leg
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run punchy drive down the pitch and the fielder at mid-on sprints across and cuts it off
Rampaul to Marsh, no run stays beside the line and defends
Rampaul to Marsh, 1 run gets beside it and angles him down to point
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run open the face of the bat and angles him down to third man
Rampaul to Marsh, 1 run slower ball on the pads and he clips him down to midwicket
Smith to Marsh, no run
Smith to Marsh, no run gets beside the line and softly taps it to the off side

Smith to Marsh, OUT careless shot really, Smith teases him with a wide delivery on a fullish length outside off, Marsh stays at the crease and chases it, drives away from the body and gets a thick edge, very straightforward take for Ramdin
Smith to Ponting, 1 run angles it on the pads and he clips it to midwicket, Simmons fumbles
Smith to Watson, no run full on middle and leg and defended back to the bowler
Smith to Watson, 1 run slower ball outside off and he dabs it just wide of point
Rampaul to Watson, 1 run full outside off and tapped just in front of point and sets off
Rampaul to Ponting, no run shout for an lbw, lunges forward to defend but the ball swings back in and hits him outside the line of off, Bowden shakes his head
Rampaul to Ponting, no run excellent sliding stop at point, the fielder flings himself to his right and saves a few runs for sure
Rampaul to Ponting, no run pushes it to the off side
Rampaul to Ponting, 1 run angles it on the body and easily worked away down to fine leg
Rampaul to Watson, no run stays back and punches it towards midwicket
Smith to Ponting, no run gets across his stumps and taps him down to midwicket
Smith to Ponting, no run firmly driven but well stopped by short cover, the West Indian fielding has been impressive save for one misfield at midwicket
Smith to Ponting, no run forward and pushed down to short cover

Smith to Ponting, SIX runs exquisite! Ponting comes down the pitch early and Smith pitches it up for his liking, lofts him elegantly just over the long-off rope, that's 2000 runs at the MCG for Ponting
Smith to Ponting, 2 leg byes on the pads and he clips him away down to fine leg, 2 leg byes
Smith to Ponting, no run gets beside the line and steers him to the off side
Roach to Watson, 1 run shuffles and clips him to the off side
Roach to Ponting, no run 143 kph, just short of a length and he gets his elbows high to defend
Roach to Ponting, no run 143.5 kph, pitches it up and he pushes it to the off side
Roach to Ponting, 1 run shuffles and tucks him away down to square leg
Roach to Watson, 1 run chops it down to short third man for a single
Roach to Ponting, no run
Smith to Watson, 1 run on the backfoot, he stays back and punches it down to mid-on and sets off for a quick single
Smith to Ponting, no run stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
Smith to Ponting, 2 runs slower ball outside off and he bends down and carves it over backward point, seemed like he would spoon it straight to the fielder
Smith to Ponting, no run good length outside off, Ponting gets on the front foot and defends
Smith to Ponting, no run full outside off and pushed to short cover
Smith to Ponting, no run pulls to short midwicket and mistimes the shot
Miller to Watson, no run bowls it flat and quick and he drives down to cover
Miller to Watson, 2 runs full again and driven down to sweeper cover
Miller to Watson, no run
Miller to Watson, no run slower through the air and drops it on a good length, he stays back and cuts to point
Miller to Watson, no run full on the stumps and driven back to the bowler
Miller to Watson, no run gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Smith to Ponting, 2 runs full on the pads and worked down to mid-on
Smith to Ponting, 2 runs full on the pads and clipped down to deep square leg
Smith to Ponting, no run stays beside the line and defends to the off side
Smith to Ponting, no run pushes it down to point
Smith to Ponting, 1 run full on the pads and pushed down to mid-on
Smith to Watson, 5 wide poor delivery, down the leg side and it beats everyone, including short fine leg
Smith to Watson, 1 run drops it short and he plays a short arm pull down to deep midwicket
Miller to Watson, 1 run short outside the off stump, Watson gets onto the back foot and cuts it for a single
Miller to Ponting, no run fuller on the middle stump. Ponting comes forward and defends it on the leg side
Miller to Ponting, 1 run outside the off stump. Ponting comes forward and drives it to extra cover for a single
Miller to Watson, 1 run a touch short on the middle and leg. Watson bends down a touch and pulls it to deep midwicket for a single
Miller to Ponting, no run outside the off stump. Ponting comes forward and pushes it to short extra cover
Miller to Ponting, no run fuller outside the off stump. Ponting again drives it to the same fielder
Smith to Watson, no run on the off stump and coming back in. Watson closes the face of the bat and pushes it to the leg side
Smith to Watson, 1 run fuller outside the off stump. Watson drives and a misfield by Gayle at cover allows them a single
Smith to Ponting, 1 run good length delivery on the middle and leg as Ponting pushes it to long-on for a single
Smith to Watson, 2 runs brute strength there as Watson picks a fuller delivery on the off stump and lofts it over the infield on the leg side
Smith to Watson, 1 run on the middle stump. Watson punches it to long-on to give Ponting the strike
Smith to Ponting, 1 run outside the off stump. Ponting opens the face of the bat and runs it to sweeper on the off side for a single
Miller to Ponting, 1 run outside the off stump. Ponting comes forward and pushes it on the off side for a single
Miller to Watson, no run short outside off. Watson cuts it to point
Miller to Watson, 1 run on the middle stump. Watson punches it to long-on
Miller to Ponting, 1 run Outside off. Ponting comes forward and drives it to long-off for a single
Miller to Watson, no run Watson comes forward and defends a ball on the middle stump
Miller to Watson, 1 run outside off, cut to point for a single
Smith to Watson, 1 run not quite short enough to pull and so he mistimes it down to deep square
Smith to Ponting, no run
Smith to Ponting, 1 run full on the off stump and driven down to mid-off
Smith to Watson, 1 run full on the pads and he pushes it down to deep square leg
Smith to Ponting, 1 run full and driven down to extra cover
Smith to Watson, 1 run full on the pads and clips him down to midwicket
Miller to Watson, 1 run good length outside off and he cuts to sweeper cover
Miller to Ponting, no run full on the off stump and driven to the off side
Miller to Ponting, 1 run flighted on the pads and clipped to the on side
Miller to Watson, 1 run
Miller to Ponting, no run makes a lot of room too cut but he nearly slices it on the full to Smith at point
Miller to Ponting, no run full on the pads and clipped down to midwicket
Gayle to Watson, no run full outside off and driven to cover
Gayle to Watson, no run pounds it down the pitch, Gayle gets across to stop it
Gayle to Watson, no run swings and misses, just sneaks past his off stump
Gayle to Watson, 2 runs stays back and cuts him down to sweeper cover
Gayle to Watson, no run

Gayle to Watson, 1 run Gayle fumbles a run-out opportunity! The ball is played to deep midwicket and the throw from Simmons is fast and accurate but his captain makes a royal mess of it, Watson turned back, slipped and was yards out of his crease when the throw reached Gayle
Miller to Watson, 1 run gets forward and drives to cover
Miller to Ponting, FOUR runs nice shot, flighted outside off and he chips down the track and he scoops him over extra cover, beats the fielder in the deep
Miller to Ponting, no run gets forward and drives to cover
Miller to Ponting, no run Miller flings himself to his right and saves a straight drive
Miller to Ponting, 2 runs gets forward and drives him down to sweeper cover
Miller to Ponting, 1 run punches it down the pitch and the bowler tries to intercept the drive but the ball beats him

Gayle to Ponting, 1 run slower through the air and driven wide of point
Gayle to Watson, no run full on the off stump and jammed back to the bowler
Gayle to Watson, 1 run forcefully driven down to long-on
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run clips it past midwicket for a single
Miller to Ponting, SIX runs hits that to downtwon Melbourne! Chips down the track on seeing the flight and he carts him several rows over long-off
Miller to Ponting, no run full outside off and driven to point
Miller to Ponting, 1 run jogs the single to deep extra cover
Miller to Watson, 1 run flat and quick and he pulls him down to deep midwicket
Miller to Ponting, 1 run tucks it towards square leg
Miller to Watson, 1 run pushes it to sweeper cover
Gayle to Watson, 2 runs he clubs a full toss down to deep midwicket, should have found the rope

Gayle to Ponting, 1 run flighted on middle and leg and he pulls to square leg
Gayle to Watson, 2 runs pulls him to deep midwicket and he pushes hard for the second run

Gayle to Watson, OUT well bowled there, he bowled it much flatter and dropped it a bit short too on sensing Watson's intentions, he gave him the charge but didn't get to the pitch of the ball, lands down Morton's throat at long-on
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run full on the pads and clipped to midwicket
Pollard to Ponting, no run full on the off stump and driven down to short mid-off

Pollard to Ponting, 1 run
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run stays back and taps him down to long-on
Gayle to Clarke, 1 run flatter delivery and pushed through the line to long-on
Gayle to Ponting, 1 run on the pads and clipped down to deep square leg
Gayle to Clarke, no run chips down the track but clips him to Pollard at midwicket
Gayle to Clarke, no run tucks it straight to Pollard again
Gayle to Clarke, no run comes down the pitch, action replay, Pollard in action again
Pollard to Ponting, OUT Pollard strikes! a back of length ball that jags in and takes the inside-edge with the Australian captain looking to drive off the front foot, and takes out offstump
Pollard to White, 1 wide Pollard greets White with a bouncer, that was only 122.8 kmh, but it climbed sharply, white ducks under
Pollard to White, no run another shortish ball, White stands tall and guides the ball towards backward point
Pollard to White, no run defended towards mid-on this time
Pollard to White, no run drops the ball towards the wicketkeeper, and thinks about taking a single, but decides against it
Pollard to White, no run well outside off, left alone
Pollard to White, no run
Roach to Hussey, 1 run 150 kph, quick full toss outside off and he taps it towards cover
Roach to Johnson, 1 run
Roach to Hussey, 1 run squirts it down to mid-off for a quick single

Roach to Johnson, no run pulls on one leg to square leg and Hussey charges out of his crease and quickly tries to hurry back, the throw from Dowlin was to the bowler but Roach was nowhere near the stumps
Roach to Johnson, 2 runs works it away to the on side for a single
Roach to Johnson, FOUR runs lovely shot, good length on the pads and he picks the gap at deep midwicket by pulling on the backfoot
Rampaul to Hussey, 1 run slower ball on the pads and whipped to square leg
Rampaul to Johnson, no run full on the off stump, makes room and tries to cream it through the off side but finds mid-off
Rampaul to Johnson, 1 run on the pads and he works him down to short fine leg

Rampaul to Hussey, OUT another drive away from the body gives a catch to Ramdin, Husset makes a bit of room to slice it hard through the offside, may have been a slower ball, too early on the shot and the thick edge it taken by the keeper after diving forward
Rampaul to Hauritz, 1 run full outside off and driven towards cover
Rampaul to Johnson, 1 run on the pads and he whips him away down to deep midwicket

Gayle to Clarke, no run drops it back to the bowler

Gayle to Clarke, 1 run low full toss outside off and he pushes it down to long-off

Pollard to White, no run defends him down to point

Pollard to Clarke, no run
Pollard to Clarke, no run full on the pads and clipped down to midwicket
Roach to Johnson, 1 run makes room and crashes a low full toss straight to point
Roach to Hauritz, no run fast yorker at 150 kph, outside off and Hauritz hardly saw that
Roach to Hauritz, 1 run makes room and he follows him by bowling it on the blockhole outside leg, squirted to mid-on
Roach to Johnson, 1 run high full toss perhaps just below the waistline, Johnson pulls to midwicket
Roach to Hauritz, 1 run backs away and jams out a fast yorker to point

Roach to Johnson, FOUR runs shot of the evening so far! Johnson makes room to club a low full toss on the leg stump and he times it so well that the ball nearly carries all the way over deep midwicket
Rampaul to Hauritz, 2 runs drives him down to deep extra cover
Rampaul to Hauritz, 1 run full on the stumps and driven down to long-on
Rampaul to Johnson, no run makes room to bash that away past point but he swishes at thin air and the ball sails over the middle stump
Rampaul to Johnson, no run good ball, takes the pace off the ball and Johnson makes a lot of room to swing that over the on side, the ball clips his pads and goes to the keeper
Rampaul to Johnson, OUT makes room to dig it out to the on side but he misses it, beaten for pace and the yorker ball thuds on to his leg stump
Rampaul to Harris, 2 runs makes room and swings him across the line, the ball rolls behind square on the on side and they scamper two

5.55pm: West Indies will chase 257. They will be fairly pleased with this effort and they will fancy their chances if Gayle gets going early. The fielding was impressive and the bowlers didn't really allow them to blaze away. Join us at 6.40 pm.
Bollinger has the ball, Gayle on strike

West Indies are all set to start their chase of 257. Meanwhile, Hashim Amla is on the verge of his maiden Test double century to grind India in the first Test in Nagpur. Follow that game by clicking here.
Bollinger to Gayle, 1 wide starts with a 134kmh bouncer, too high for the umpire's liking
Bollinger to Gayle, 1 run shortish and into the ribs, Gayle swats that down to fine leg, great timing, nearly through to the fielder in the deep, lands a few yards short of him though
Bollinger to Morton, no run nearly a wicket there, Morton gets an inside edge and the ball bounces just in front of the stumps and sails over

Bollinger to Morton, 1 run Morton again defends unconvincingly, another inside edge, the ball rolls towards the off side, Gayle was haring through for the single and was nearly at the striker's end when Morton responds
Bollinger to Gayle, no run short ball, Gayle takes a big swish at it, eyeing the midwicket boundary, but doesn't connect

Bollinger to Gayle, 2 runs this time the short ball is on legstump, Gayle lifts his front leg as he helps the ball just over Shaun Marsh at square leg, the sun was in Marsh's eyes which might have saved Gayle
Bollinger to Gayle, FOUR runs again Bollinger digs it in, another flat bat swipe from Gayle, bottom-edges it just wide of a diving Haddin to the fine leg boundary
Harris to Morton, no run Morton plays his third unconvincing shot, he's slow on his stroke and inside-edges the ball onto his boot
Harris to Morton, no run much more solid this time, shows the full face of the bat as he defends back towards the bowler
Harris to Morton, no run shaping into the batsman, length delivery, 148kmh, punched towards mid-on
Harris to Morton, no run back of a length and outside off, Morton gets nicely forward and defends, that ball was 144kmh
Harris to Morton, 2 runs length ball outside off, Morton jabs at it and guides it past slip and towards third man
Harris to Morton, no run Harris sends down a length ball at 145kmh, pushed off the front foot to mid-on

Bollinger to Gayle, OUT Bollinger has struck, that's the end of Gayle, yet another short ball, Gayle went for the pull, gets a top-edge and the ball swirls towards mid-off, Johnson was setting off to his right initially and had to change direction and run backwards before collecting the
Bollinger to Morton, no run Morton defends cautiously off the backfoot, gets behind the line of a short of length ball
Bollinger to Morton, no run length ball outside off, eased towards mid-off off the front foot
Bollinger to Morton, no run shortish ball outside off, slapped towards cover
Bollinger to Morton, no run not sure Morton was watching that all the way, a bouncer and Morton slugs it towards square leg, straight towards the fielder
Bollinger to Morton, no run length ball outside off, defended back towards the bowler
Harris to Dowlin, no run Dowlin faces his first ball, well outside off and he shoulders arms

Harris to Dowlin, 1 run nearly a run-out there, Harris pegs Dowlin onto the backfoot with a short ball, Dowling fends it to the leg side, Harris races across in front of the non-striker and gets to the ball, and nearly throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Dowlin would have b

Harris to Morton, no run punched back to the bowler, and there's more good fielding from the bowler, Morton is on all fours as he tries to scrambles back into his crease after playing the shot, Harris opts to not throw the ball
Harris to Simmons, no run Simmons gets a 148kmh delivery first up, defends watchfully
Harris to Simmons, no run short of length and outside off, Simmons gets forward and pushes the ball towards cover
Bollinger to Dowlin, no run full delivery outside off, Dowlin defends to the off side

Bollinger to Dowlin, OUT Windies are collapsing, Dowlin joins the procession, it was a delivery angling across the batsman, pitching outside off and going away, the batsman gets well forward and wafts away from his body, gets the outside edge to second slip
Bollinger to Deonarine, 2 runs low full toss on off, carved though covers by Deonarine, mistimed though so it doesn't go all the way to the boundary
Bollinger to Deonarine, 1 run Bollinger keeps it tight outside off, Deonarine pokes it behind backward point
Bollinger to Simmons, no run great carry through to the keeper, short of length ball angling across the batsman, who lets it through to Haddin
Bollinger to Simmons, no run pegs away at offstump, Simmons defends off the front foot, gets a bit of an inside-edge, the ball dribbles to the leg side
Harris to Deonarine, no run back of a length ball, heading for offstump, 145.9kmh, blocked off the backfoot
Harris to Deonarine, no run similar delivery, 146.4kmh this time, more backfoot dfefence, this time towards the bowler
Harris to Deonarine, 5 wide messes up his line this time, well down the leg side, it was a shortish ball but died on its way to the keeper, too low for a diving Haddin to collect
Harris to Deonarine, no run clipped towards square leg, calls for a single but there's no response
Harris to Deonarine, no run length ball outside off, driven towards cover off the front foot
Harris to Deonarine, 1 wide another delivery down the leg side
Harris to Deonarine, no run gets his line right this time, angling across the left-hand batsman, who is happy to leave the ball to the keeper
Harris to Deonarine, 1 run shortish ball, steered towards backward point and a tight single is taken
Bollinger to Deonarine, 4 leg byes on the legstump, brushes Deonarine's thigh pad and loops past the keeper on the way to the fine leg boundary
Bollinger to Deonarine, no run length ball on off, solidly defended towards mid-off
Bollinger to Deonarine, no run back of length and homing into offstump, more solid defence from Deonarine
Bollinger to Deonarine, no run a repeat of the previous delivery, a touch slower though, 129kmh where the previous one is 140-plus, blocked to the leg side
Bollinger to Deonarine, no run just slightly wide outside off, pushed towards cover off the backfoot
Bollinger to Deonarine, no run back to pegging away at off, defended towards point this time
Harris to Simmons, no run length ball bowled from wide of the crease, slanting into offstump, pushed back towards the bowler
Harris to Simmons, no run defends with a slightly open face towards the off side, that was another tight delivery on offstump
Harris to Simmons, no run on middle and off this time, opens the face of the bat to guide the ball towards cover
Harris to Simmons, no run 143kmh, Simmons is beaten by that one, in the channel outside off, Simmons was looking to defend to the off side but ended up playing inside the line
Harris to Simmons, no run a touch shorter from Harris, Simmons gets forward and pushes the ball towards mid-on
Harris to Simmons, no run first ball that is not targetting offstump this over, easy leave for Simmons as that delivery was a couple of feet outside off, that's a maiden for Harris
Johnson to Deonarine, FOUR runs starts with a shortish ball outside off, 143.8kmh, Deonarine slashes it uppishly over backward point for four
Johnson to Deonarine, no run length ball and pretty wide outside off, umpire must have thought about that before deciding to not call it a 'wide'
Johnson to Deonarine, no run gets it much closer to off this time, 145kmh, slapped towards point
Johnson to Deonarine, 1 run another back of length ball just outside off, Deonarine shuffles across and turns it behind square leg in an ungainly manner
Johnson to Simmons, no run short of length again, heading for offstump, blocked to the off side, Simmons thinks of the single but decides against it
Johnson to Simmons, no run full and wide, Simmons is tempted into a cover drive, he misses and the ball scurries through to the keeper
Watson to Deonarine, 1 run starts off with a 126kmh, back of length on the pads, tucked towards short fine leg
Watson to Simmons, 2 runs lovely stroke from Simmons, short and wide, cuts that powerfully behind point, Johnson does the fielding in the deep
Watson to Simmons, no run back of a length outside off, pushed towards cover off the front foot, Watson seems a little easier to deal with after the three express bowlers before him
Watson to Simmons, no run length ball outside off, a confident front-foot cover drive, straight at the fielder
Watson to Simmons, no run angling into offstump, punched towards mid-on, Simmons again takes a couple of steps for the single but turns back
Watson to Simmons, no run length ball well outside off, left alone by Simmons
Johnson to Deonarine, no run batsman shoulders arms to a wide delivery outside off
Johnson to Deonarine, no run fullish and on offstump, defended back to the bowler
Johnson to Deonarine, no run 146.3kmh bouncer, Deonarine thought of the pull but decides to duck under instead
Johnson to Deonarine, FOUR runs Johnson presents a half-volley and Deonarine clubs that past extra cover for four, splendid shot
Johnson to Deonarine, no run Johnson shortens the length, keeps the line on off, Deonarine blocks towards point
Johnson to Deonarine, no run length ball outside off, Deonarine content to leave that one
Watson to Simmons, no run length ball on off, Simmons walks across the stumps to clip the ball towards the leg side
Watson to Simmons, no run mistimes a backfoot drive towards cover, taht was a short of length ball outside off
Watson to Simmons, 1 run similar length but a bit of width for Simmons, who steers the ball towards third man
Watson to Deonarine, 1 run a slower full ball just outside off, driven down towards mid-off, where a diving Harris does the fielding
Watson to Simmons, no run short of length, keeps it in the corridor outside off, defended to the off side by Simmons
Watson to Simmons, no run similar delivery, Simmons crunches it towards point, straight at the fielder, so there's no time for a single
Johnson to Deonarine, no run full ball just outside off, 147kmh, left alone
Johnson to Deonarine, FOUR runs another 147kmh delivery, short and not much width but Deonarine hammers that past White at point for four, White just about got a hand on that one but couldn't stop it
Johnson to Deonarine, no run shortish ball on the pads, clipped towards square leg
Johnson to Deonarine, no run 144 kmh bouncer, Deonarine spots it early and ducks

Johnson to Deonarine, OUT Deonarine has played some good cuts today, but this time he can only find Ponting at backward point, superb catch from Ponting, timing his jump perfectly as he latched onto that overhead chance, great captaincy as well, Ponting wasn't in that position at the s
Johnson to Pollard, no run 148.4 kmh first ball, Pollard was late reacting, it was short of a length on middle, Pollard just about gets his bat down to send the ball rolling towards square leg
Watson to Simmons, 1 run Simmons opens the face and pokes the ball towards Ponting at backward point, there's a direct hit but Pollard has made his ground
Watson to Pollard, no run well outside off, left alone by Pollard
Watson to Pollard, no run closer to off this time, but Pollard is again not interested, Haddin collects
Watson to Pollard, no run length ball just outside off, Pollard drives it crisply towards mid-off

Watson to Pollard, FOUR runs Pollard isn't going to hang around, especially in the Powerplays, that was a length ball outside off, Pollard clubs that over mid-on for four, not too well timed but enough to send it for four
Watson to Pollard, 2 runs this time some finesse from Pollard, shuffling across the stumps and tucking the ball behind square leg for a couple, batsmen should have pushed for a third there
Johnson to Simmons, 1 run dabbed towards point for a single
Johnson to Pollard, no run 148.4kmh, that was too quick for Pollard, manages to defend it though off the backfoot
Johnson to Pollard, no run not to short from Johnson, but Pollard opts to sway out of the line of the ball, dropping his wrists and it sails through past offstump to the keeper
Johnson to Pollard, 1 wide quick, back of length ball down the leg side, Pollard scuttles across the stumps to get out of it's way
Johnson to Pollard, 3 runs pitched up and outside off this time, Pollard is quickly onto the front foot and caresses that one in front of point

Johnson to Simmons, 2 byes full and wide, much slower from Johnson, 132.6kmh, doesn't bounce much and it's touch take for Haddin, bouncing the second time just in front of him, he gives away a couple of byes
Johnson to Simmons, no run well outside off, and left alone by Simmons, and Billy Bowden calls 'drinks'
Watson to Pollard, no run back of length ball heading for offstump, defended off the front foot
Watson to Pollard, 1 run similar delivery, driven firmly towards mid-off for a single
Watson to Simmons, 2 runs on middle and leg this time, tucked towards square leg
Watson to Simmons, no run Watson keeps it short of a good length, outside off this time, driven towards cover
Watson to Simmons, 1 run fuller this time, just outside off, Simmons works it away towards square leg

Watson to Pollard, FOUR runs an uncommon sight that, a misfield from an Australian fielder, it was Ryan Harris who let the ball through at long-on as he looked to pick up the ball, Pollard had driven the ball there but not with his trademark power
Johnson to Simmons, no run fuller on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
Johnson to Simmons, no run bottom hand comes off the bat as Simmons looks to drive that ball past covers, doesn't beat the fielder
Johnson to Simmons, 1 run shortish on middle stump, Simmons jumps and turns the ball towards midwicket, sprints through for a single after that
Johnson to Pollard, no run full and outside off, left alone by Pollard
Johnson to Pollard, no run on legstump, just back of a length, Pollard was looking to tuck that to square leg, deflects it onto his pads instead

Johnson to Pollard, 1 wide a stfiled appeal for caught behind, Pollard looks to glance the ball, but seems to have missed it, Haddin was sure that was out and started running towards the stumps, only then did he start to appeal and he's bemused when it is turned down and the ball call
Johnson to Pollard, 1 run
Bollinger to Pollard, 1 leg bye down the leg side, looks to play it towards square leg, gets it on the pads and the ball dribbles towards backward point
Bollinger to Simmons, no run Simmons clips the ball from offstump to just in front of square leg
Bollinger to Simmons, no run fuller outside off, pushed towards the off side off the front foot
Bollinger to Simmons, no run
Bollinger to Simmons, no run length ball outside off, driven towards cover off the front foot
Bollinger to Simmons, no run angling across the batsman, full delivery, left alone by Simmons and that's a maiden for Bollinger
Hauritz to Pollard, 1 run fullish ball, driven down to long-off, all along the ground
Hauritz to Simmons, 2 byes well outside off, Simmons looks to paddle-sweep that one, he misses as does Haddin
Hauritz to Simmons, 1 run Simmons plays this one with soft hands towards backward point and pinches a single
Hauritz to Pollard, 1 run a wristy on-drive to a full delivery sends the ball scurrying towards long-on
Hauritz to Simmons, FOUR runs a touch short from Hauritz, Simmons is quickly onto the backfoot and slashes that one past backward point, superb timing from Simmons and played very, very late
Hauritz to Simmons, no run same length but not as much width as the previous ball, Simmons plays a similar stroke, but doesn't beat backward point
Bollinger to Pollard, no run full and just outside off, punched towards mid-on
Bollinger to Pollard, 1 run short ball on middle stump line, Pollard swivels and pulls it towards deep square leg
Bollinger to Simmons, 1 run length ball heading for off, Simmons drops the ball to the off side and the batsmen zip through for a single
Bollinger to Pollard, 2 leg byes length ball pitching outside leg, might have hit Pollard just outside leg as well, dribbles behind square leg
Bollinger to Pollard, no run back of length, again heading for off, Pollard defends the ball to the leg side

Bollinger to Pollard, FOUR runs a bit of a mishit form Pollard, short of length ball on middle and leg, Pollard swings that wide and over mid-on, he doesn't need to time the ball perfectly to get it to the boundary
Hauritz to Simmons, 2 runs short and wide, carves it past backward point
Hauritz to Simmons, no run full ball just outside off, steered towards backward point
Hauritz to Simmons, 2 runs full nad outside off, gets nicely onto the front foot and driven past covers
Hauritz to Simmons, no run Simmons loves the cut shot, another slightly wide ball, Simmons eyes the areas around point but can only bottom-edge it and it goes to the keeper on the bounce
Hauritz to Simmons, no run played off the front foot towards cover
Hauritz to Simmons, 1 run overpitched and well outside off, Simmon paddle-sweeps the ball very fine down the leg side
Harris to Simmons, 1 run Simons guides it past backward point for a single
Harris to Pollard, 1 run another single, this time by turning the ball behind square leg
Harris to Simmons, no run
Harris to Simmons, 1 run back of a length, no room at all for the batsman, Simmons drops it to the off side and sprints for the single
Harris to Pollard, 1 run just outside off, Pollard deftly dabs the ball towards third man for a single, Pollard looking in good touch here
Harris to Simmons, no run 'Noooo' is the scream from both batsmen after Simmons opens the face to steer the ball towards backward point
Hauritz to Pollard, 1 run a touch short, and a bit of width as well, helped towards covers for a single
Hauritz to Simmons, 2 runs full and wide, Simmons drives uppishly wide of long-off, doesn't time it too well, but it lands safely
Hauritz to Simmons, no run another full delivery, on the stumps this time, defended towards the off side
Hauritz to Simmons, 1 run quick single taken by pushing the ball towards point
Hauritz to Pollard, no run Pollard looks to defend off the front foot but is beaten as the ball slips past the outside edge
Hauritz to Pollard, 1 run back of a length, turning into offstump, clipped behind square leg for an ambled single
Harris to Pollard, 1 run short ball, 142.8kmh, Pollard swings it around to deep square leg
Harris to Simmons, 1 run back of a length and just outside off, driven towards cover point
Harris to Pollard, 2 runs same length, this time the ball is on middle and off, turned towards fine leg, Pollard hurries through the first run to have time for the second
Harris to Pollard, 1 run another short ball, pulled to square leg easily
Harris to Simmons, no run swing and a miss to a fullish ball outside off
Harris to Simmons, no run short of length on offstump, played with soft hands towards cover, batsmen wisely decide to not chance a single
Hauritz to Pollard, no run length ball just outside off, gets a bit of an outside edge towards backward point
Hauritz to Pollard, no run fuller and on middle and off, defended back down the pitch
Hauritz to Pollard, 1 run overpitched and eased down to long-on for a single
Hauritz to Simmons, 1 run flighted delivery, full and wide, Simmons slaps it towards cover

Hauritz to Pollard, OUT that's the end of Pollard, this shot would have been a six in many international ground, Pollard clubbed that one powerfully, but gets a bit too much height, Johnson is there at the long-on boundary, positioning himself nicely to take the catch a few metres insi
Hauritz to Simmons, 1 run Simmons likes the paddle-sweep to the ball which is well outside off, gets it towards short fine leg
Watson to Simmons, 1 run starts with a shortish ball on offstump, guided towards backward point
Watson to Ramdin, 1 run a bit of width, the batsman throws his bat at it, Ponting dives at backward point to field

Watson to Simmons, OUT and another big blow for West Indies, with that their slim hopes are gone, Simmons was looking to guide that length delivery towards third man but gets a thick edge to the keeper, the ball kept low but Haddin clings on to it after diving to his right
Watson to Smith, no run Smith slaps his first delivery towards point
Watson to Smith, no run short ball and well outside off, Smith flails at it but doesn't connect
Watson to Smith, no run length ball outside off, batsman shoulders arms
Johnson to Ramdin, 1 run this one kicks up off a good length, fends it off is body to the on side
Johnson to Smith, 1 run rises up on him again and he flicks it towards square leg
Johnson to Ramdin, no run fullish in length outside off and driven firmly to mid-off
Johnson to Ramdin, no run stays back and taps it down with soft hands
Johnson to Ramdin, 1 run gives him width outside off and he opens the face and dabs him down to third man
Johnson to Smith, no run full on the middle stump and pushed towards mid-off

Watson to Ramdin, FOUR runs nice timing on that one, fractionally short outside off and he plays a short arm pull across the line and beats midwicket, looked like two runs at first but the ball sped away from Bollinger
Watson to Ramdin, 1 run opens the face and dabs it behind square on the off side
Watson to Smith, no run slower ball and he tries to bang that outta here but he's beaten
Watson to Smith, no run gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
Watson to Smith, FOUR runs good shot, he drops it short and he picks the length early, swivels and clubs it over square leg
Watson to Smith, no run pushes it down to mid-off
Johnson to Ramdin, 1 run pretty close to offstump, but the batsman decides to late cut it, gets it towards short third man
Johnson to Smith, no run just back of a length on legstump, defended back towards the bowler
Johnson to Smith, no run full and quick, angling across the batsman, who lets it through to the keeper
Johnson to Smith, no run that one was too quick for Smith, 147 kmh, Smith was looking to defend off the back foot but the ball slips through between bat and body
Johnson to Smith, no run short of length ball outside off, powerfully slapped towards backward point where Ponting fields
Johnson to Smith, 2 wide bowled from wide of the crease, going way down the leg side
Johnson to Ramdin, FOUR runs again from wide of the crease, full and outside off, punched beautifully through the gap between mid-off and extra cover
Harris to Smith, no run Harris plugs away at a back of a length, just outside off, pushed towards cover
Harris to Smith, no run same length, no width again for the batsman, defended off the backfoot

Harris to Smith, no run once more on the same length, on middle and leg, defended towards short midwicket, Ramdin was racing for the single but had to stop and turn back, a direct hit would have caught him short
Harris to Smith, 1 run shorter and on legstump, clipped towards square leg
Harris to Ramdin, 1 run fullish and outside off, a thick outside edge sends the ball towards Johnson at third man
Harris to Smith, no run slanting into middle stump, defended watchfully towards the bowler
Hauritz to Ramdin, 1 run Ramdin again steers a ball close to offstump towards backward point
Hauritz to Smith, 1 run looks to drive towards mid-off, gets an inside edge towards square leg
Hauritz to Ramdin, 1 run length ball well outside off, Ramdin gets on one knee and sweeps
Hauritz to Ramdin, 1 run length ball on off, pushed towards midwicket
Hauritz to Miller, no run Miller looks to slam his first ball through extra cover, doesn't connect
Harris to Rampaul, no run fullish ball on middle, driven towards the off side
Harris to Rampaul, no run back of a length on off, guided towards backward point
Harris to Rampaul, 1 run edged towards third man off the backfoot
Harris to Miller, 1 run another outside edge, again to third man
Harris to Rampaul, no run driven off the front foot towards point
Hauritz to Miller, no run way outside the offstump, just within legal limits
Hauritz to Miller, 2 runs full and wide, Miller gets it away past backward point for two
Hauritz to Miller, no run taps the ball towards the leg side
Hauritz to Miller, no run gets well forward and blocks the ball
Hauritz to Miller, 1 run a quick single is stolen after the ball is pushed towards cover
Hauritz to Rampaul, 1 run full ball on off, swept towards square leg
Harris to Rampaul, no run homing into offstump, defended off the backfoot
Harris to Rampaul, no run similar delivery, Rampaul tries to make room and cuts it towards point
Harris to Rampaul, 1 run checks his shot this time, steering the ball towards third man
Harris to Miller, no run pegging away at a short of length, on offstump, defended towards point
Harris to Miller, no run slower ball, 126kmh, full delivery just outside off, defended towards the off side
Hauritz to Rampaul, no run Hauritz fires it into the pads, defended to the leg side

Hauritz to Rampaul, OUT Australia go 1-0 up, Rampaul sweeps without too much power behind the shot, the ball loops to Shaun Marsh at deep midwicket, simple catch and West Indies go down by 113 runs, Gayle's 4-1 prediction looks implausible now, Australia picked up their sixth straight
That's it from us at Cricinfo for today, thanks for all the mails, join us again on Tuesday to see how the second ODI in Adelaide turns out.

Well, that was clinical from Australia, the bowling looked particularly good, especially with the new ball. The absence of the likes of Lee, Bracken and Siddle is hardly being felt, West Indies being rolled over for 143. Kieron Pollard showed us a glimpse of his all-round skills, and West Ind
Australia won by 113 runs
Player of the match is Shane Watson, AUS
